name: Colour Me Wavy
description:
You are a wavy creature who can not produce his own colour. You can however take over other object's colour wavelengths and the properties they possess. Use this to your advantage to discover your own true colour in our 2D puzzle platformer game!

Credits:

Game:

Yannick Zwijsen - Programming
Hans Jacobs - Programming & Level Design
Nele Custers - Art & Animation

Audio & Sound Effect by the on site audio team:

Pablo Schwilden
Martin Schmalzried
Ben Cornelius Tanghe
Maxime Quardon
